name: analyze_table_tool
description: Specialized tool for extracting and analyzing tabular data organized in rows and columns. ONLY use for: data tables, spreadsheets, comparison charts, statistical tables, research data tables, financial tables, schedules, lists organized in grid format, and any structured data presented in tabular form. NOT for: diagrams, flowcharts, handwriting, decorative layouts, or non-tabular content. If no tabular data is found, returns that no table content was detected and suggests checking with user for appropriate tool selection.

image_path.description: S3 URL (s3://bucket/key) or absolute file path to the image. Use this OR image_data, not both.

image_data.description: Base64-encoded image data. Use this OR image_path, not both. Preferred when image is already in memory.

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials
